sen.j: 京都会議（きょうとかいぎ）は、京都（京都府、京都市）で開催される会議の通称。
sen.e: The Kyoto Conference is a common name of the conference which is held in Kyoto (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture).
The Kyoto Conference is a common name of the conference which is held in Kyoto (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture).
The Kyoto Conference is a common name of the conference which is held in Kyoto (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 京都市には国立京都国際会館があるため、多くの国際会議が開催されている。
sen.e: Since there is Kyoto International Conference Center in Kyoto City, many conferences has been held in Kyoto.
Since there is Kyoto International Conference Center in Kyoto City, many conferences has been held in Kyoto.
Since there is Kyoto International Conference Center in Kyoto City, many conferences has been held in Kyoto.

sen.j: 代表的なものは以下の通り。
sen.e: The famous conferences are as follows.
The famous conferences are as follows.
The famous conferences are as follows.

sen.j: ジュネーブ軍縮会議京都会議（第1回：1989年4月、直近は第6回：2005年8月）
sen.e: The Kyoto Conference of the Conference on Disarmament (the first conference was held on April 1989, the latest conference was the sixth one held on August 2005)
The Kyoto Conference of the Conference on Disarmament (the first conference was held on April 1989, the latest conference was the sixth one held on August 2005)
The Kyoto Conference of the Conference on Disarmament (the 1st conference was held in April 1989, the latest conference was the 6th one held in August 2005)

sen.j: 第45回国際捕鯨委員会科学委員会及び総会（1993年5月）
sen.e: The forty-fifth Committee on Science and General Assembly of International Whaling Commission (May 1993)
The forty-fifth Committee on Science and General Assembly of International Whaling Commission (May 1993)
The 45th Committee on Science and General Assembly of International Whaling Commission (May 1993)

sen.j: 絶滅のおそれのある野生動植物の種の国際取引に関する条約（ワシントン条約）第8回締約国会議（1996年3月）
sen.e: The eighth Conference of Parties of Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (May 1996)
The eighth Conference of Parties of Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (May 1996)
The 8th Conference of Parties of Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (May 1996)

tit.j: 第3回気候変動枠組条約締約国会議（1997年12月）
tit.e: The third Conference of Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (December 1997)
The third Conference of Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (December 1997)
The 3rd Conference of Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (December 1997)

sen.e: It adopted the Kyoto Protocol.
Adopted the Kyoto Protocol.
Adopted the Kyoto Protocol.

tit.j: 第22回世界遺産委員会（1998年12月）

sen.j: - 古都奈良の文化財の登録を決定
sen.e: It determined the registration of the cultural properties in Nara, an ancient capital of Japan.
Determined the registration of the cultural properties in Nara, an ancient capital of Japan.
Determined the registration of the cultural properties in Nara, an ancient capital of Japan.

tit.j: 日本青年会議所京都会議
tit.e: The Kyoto Conference of Junior Chamber International Japan
The Kyoto Conference of Junior Chamber International Japan
The Kyoto Conference of Junior Chamber International Japan

sen.j: - 日本青年会議所が毎年1月第3週末に開催する定時総会の一。
sen.e: It is one of the annual general assembly of Junior Chamber International Japan which is held at the third weekend of January every year.
One of the annual general assembly of Junior Chamber International Japan which is held at the third weekend of January every year.
One of the annual general assembly of Junior Chamber International Japan which is held at the third weekend of January every year.
